original_title: Motorcycle gunmen strike again in H’tota
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 38-year-old man was shot and killed in Suchi village, Hambantota on Sunday (21) night.
Sri Lanka Police said that two unidentified men on a motorcycle had opened fire at the victim at around 9 PM and fled the scene.
The victim who was seriously injured was ruled dead upon admission to the hospital.
The motive for the shooting has not been revealed, said Sri Lanka Police.
